snippet: The Mexican authorities said Tuesday that they had staged 153 raids in the last year on a train known as “The Beast” that rolled toward the United States crowded with Central Americans.
abstract: Mexican authorities say they have staged 153 raids in last year on train known as 'The Beast' that brought Central Americans into the United States.
lead_paragraph: The Mexican authorities said Tuesday that they had staged 153 raids in the last year on a train known as “The Beast” that rolled toward the United States crowded with Central Americans.

headline.main: Migrant Train Raided by Mexican Authorities
